en: In this example, you must remember that this approach only treats the symptoms without getting to the root of the problem, just like treating a headache by doing something mundane, or treating foot pain by massaging the feet.
pinyin: dà jiā yí dìng yào jì de, zhè zhǒng zuò fǎ zhǐ shì zhì biāo bù zhì běn, jiù xiàng shì tóu tòng yī tóu, jiǎo tòng yī jiǎo yī yàng.

en: In this sentence, it is important for societal development to be holistic rather than patchwork, without addressing root issues.
pinyin: zài shè huì fā zhǎn guò chéng zhōng, wǒ men xū yào zuò dào quán miàn fā zhǎn, bù néng guāng shì tóu tòng yī tóu, jiǎo tòng yī jiǎo.

en: This example sentence emphasizes the need to approach problems by finding the root of the issue rather than just treating the symptoms as they occur.
pinyin: bié zǒng shì yòng “tóu tòng yī tóu, jiǎo tòng yī jiǎo” de fāng fǎ, nǐ dé zhǎo dào wèn tí de gēn yuán cái néng zhēn zhèng jiě jué tā.
